page.title: 06INDUSTRY AND EMPLOYMENT
page.content: There are no large centres of industry or employment in the Keevil area. Family run farms dominate local in- dustry but do not employ appreciable numbers of workers. Several self- employed business people operate from home in such diverse fields as building,information retrieval and the manufacture of knitwear. The latter specialises in the design and com- pletion of original knitwear. One business which exists in Keevil is a home-based wholesale tobacconists, also supplying crisps, etc to the trade. Near Worton, the Devizes Cats Hotel, founded in 1981, has expanded to 24 kiosks to cope with growing demand for the excellent care provided by this family business. Hourly paid domestic help is an area in which local demand exceeds supply. Commuters travel to Trowbridge,Bath and further.
